card.name: Book of Mazarbul
card.property: Tale. Bearer must be a Dwarf. At the start of each fellowship phase when the fellowship is at site 4 or higher, you may draw a card for each Dwarf companion.
”'It seems to be a record of the fortunes of Balin's folk….'”

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Bearer must be Gimli. Fellowship: Exert Gimli to add 1 to the number of pipes you can spot.
”'And certainly it was from Bree that the art of smoking the genuine weed spread in the recent centuries among Dwarves and such other folk….'”

card.name: Mines of Khazad-Dum
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each time you play a [Dwarven] tale, you may heal a Dwarf companion.
”'Moria! Moria! Wonder of the Northern world!'”

card.name: A Royal Welcome
card.property: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a Dwarf ally to heal a Dwarf companion.
”'There is even a chance that Dwarves are there, and that in some deep hall of his fathers, Balin son of Fundin may be found.'”

card.name: Song of Durin
card.property: Tale. To play, exert a Dwarf. Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of each [Moria] weapon is +2. Fellowship: Discard this condition to discard up to 2 [Moria] conditions.
“No harp is wrung, no hammer falls: / The darkness dwells in Durin's halls….”

card.name: Storm of Argument
card.property: Fellowship: Reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Shuffle up to X [Dwarven] cards from your discard pile into your draw deck, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
”'I will be dead before I see the Ring in the hands of an Elf!'”

card.name: Arwen
card.property: Ranger. Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, discard 3 cards from hand to prevent that wound.
”'If I can cross the river, the power of my people will protect him.'”

card.name: Arwen
card.property: While you can spot 3 [Elven] allies whose home is site 3, each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -3.
“Queenly she looked, and thought and knowledge were in her glance, as of one who has known many things that the years bring.”

card.name: Beren and Luthien
card.property: Tale. Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert an [Elven] ally to discard the bottom card of your draw deck. If that card is an [Elven] card, make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -1.

card.name: Calaglin
card.property: Archer. Regroup: Exert Calaglin to wound a minion.
”'We have been keeping watch on the rivers, ever since we saw a great troop of Orcs going north toward Moria….'”

card.name: Cast It Into the Fire
card.property: Maneuver: Spot an Elf to make each opponent discard a card from his or her hand. Draw a card for each card discarded in this way.
”'It should have been cast then into Orodruin's fire nigh at hand where it was made.'”

card.name: Dinendal
card.property: Archer. Regroup: Exert Dinendal to remove (2).
“He was almost certain that he could hear stealthy movements…. Not Elves; for the woodland folk were altogether noiseless in their movements.”

card.name: Elrond
card.property: At the start of each of your turns, you may spot an ally whose home is site 3 to heal that ally twice. Regroup: Exert Elrond twice to heal a companion.
“Venerable he seemed as a king crowned with many winters, and yet hale as a tried warrior….”

card.name: Erestor
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. Response: If an Elf is about to take a wound from a [Sauron] minion or [Sauron] event, exert Erestor to prevent that wound.
”'Then there are but two courses… to hide the Ring for ever, or to unmake it.'”

card.name: Forests of Lothlorien
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, you may spot 3 [Elven] allies to wound a minion.

card.name: Friends of Old
card.property: Fellowship: Reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Heal X [Elven] allies, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
”'You have been summoned here to answer the threat of Mordor.'”

card.name: Galadriel
card.property: At the start of each of your turns, you may heal an Elf. Fellowship: Exert Galadriel to play the fellowship's next site if it is a forest (replacing opponent's site if necessary).
”'There is in her and in this land no evil, unless a man bring it hither himself. Then let him beware!'”

card.name: Galdor
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. Regroup: Exert Galdor and spot a minion to return that minion to its owner's hand.
”'My heart tells me that Sauron will expect us to take the western way, when he learns what has befallen. He soon will.'”

card.name: Gift of the Evenstar
card.property: To play, spot Arwen. Bearer must be Aragorn. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn or discard 2 cards from hand to make a minion skirmishing Aragorn strength -1.
”'It is mine to give to whom I will… like my heart.'”

card.name: Golradir
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: Exert Golradir to make an Orc strength -1.
Their stay at Rivendell provided the Fellowship with counsel from many sources.

card.name: Long-knives of Legolas
card.property: Bearer must be Legolas. Each Orc or Uruk-hai skirmishing Legolas is strength -2.
Sharp, bone-handled knives defend the Elves of Mirkwood at close quarters.

card.name: Master of Healing
card.property: Fellowship or Regroup: Spot Elrond (or 2 [Elven] allies) to heal a companion or ally.
”'Elrond has cured you: he has tended you for days, ever since you were brought in.'”

card.name: Nenya
card.property: Bearer must be Galadriel. At the start of each regroup phase, you may discard up to 2 cards from hand to draw the same number of cards.
”'Verily it is in the land of L�rien upon the finger of Galadriel that one of the Three remains. This is Nenya, the Ring of Adamant, and I am its keeper.'”

card.name: Phial of Galadriel
card.property: To play, exert an Elf. Bearer must be the Ring-bearer. Bearer's resistance is +2.
”'May it be a light to you in dark places, when all other lights go out. Remember Galadriel and her Mirror!'”

card.name: Saelbeth
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: Exert Saelbeth to make an Uruk-hai strength -1.
The wisdom of Saelbeth prepared the Company for the dangers they would face.

card.name: Something Draws Near
card.property: Fellowship or Maneuver: Exert an Elf to discard an [Isengard] possession or [Isengard] artifact.
”'We have hunted and slain many Orcs in the woods….'”

card.name: Vilya
card.property: Bearer must be Elrond. Maneuver: Exert Elrond twice and spot a Shadow condition to return that condition to its owner's hand.
“Upon his finger was a ring of gold with a great blue stone, Vilya, mightiest of the Three.”

card.name: Voice of Nimrodel
card.property: Tale. Skirmish: Exert an Elf at a river or forest to cancel a skirmish involving that Elf.
”'Beside the falls of Nimrodel, / By water clear and cool, / Her voice as falling silver fell / Into the shining pool.'”

card.name: Betrayal of Isengard
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each time an opponent draws a card (or takes a card into hand) during the Shadow phase, you may remove (1). Maneuver: Exert Gandalf to wound Saruman twice.
”'There is only one Lord of the Ring.'”

card.name: Deep in Thought
card.property: Spell. Maneuver: Spot Gandalf and 4 twilight tokens to discard all Shadow conditions.
“He was… trying to recall every memory of his former journey in the Mines, and considering anxiously the next course that he should take….”

card.name: Depart Silently
card.property: Stealth. Maneuver: At sites 1 to 5, spot Gandalf to prevent Hobbits from being assigned to skirmishes until the regroup phase. At any other site, spot Gandalf to make a Hobbit strength +3 until the regroup phase.
”'Be careful, both of you.'”

card.name: Fireworks
card.property: Spell. Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to shuffle up to 2 [Gandalf] or up to 2 [Shire] cards from your discard pile into your draw deck.
”'The finest rockets ever seen: / they burst in stars of blue and green….'”

card.name: His First Serious Check
card.property: Maneuver: Spot Gandalf to reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. You may add (X) to discard that card, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
”…a false turn now might be disastrous.”

card.name: Narya
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. At the start of each of your turns, you may add (3) to remove a burden.
”'For this is the Ring of Fire, and with it you may rekindle hearts in a world that grows chill.'”

card.name: Trust Me as You Once Did
card.property: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert Gandalf to make a companion strength +1 for each companion with the Gandalf signet you can spot (limit +3).
”'Do not take me for some conjurer of cheap tricks! I am not trying to rob you. I am trying to help you.'”

card.name: Unknown Perils
card.property: Plays to your support area. Response: If a companion is about to take a wound, spot 4 twilight tokens and exert Gandalf to prevent that wound.
“Suddenly he stopped as if listening. Frodo became aware that all was very quiet, inside and outside.”

card.name: Answering the Cries
card.property: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard a [Gondor] tale from hand to make a [Gondor] companion strength +2.
“Drawing his bright sword and crying Elendil! Elendil! he crashed through the trees.”

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves during the fellowship phase, remove (2).
”'…his hood was cast back, and his dark hair was blowing in the wind, a light was in his eyes: a king returning from exile in his own land.'”

card.name: Banner of the White Tree
card.property: Tale. Maneuver: Exert a [Gondor] companion to make that companion strength +3 and defender +1 until the regroup phase.
”'Many Elves and many mighty Men, and many of their friends, had perished in the war.'”

card.name: Citadel of Minas Tirith
card.property: Plays to your support area. You may heal a [Gondor] companion at the end of each turn during which no companion or ally lost a skirmish.
”'One day our paths will lead us there, and the Tower guards shall take up the call - The Lords of Gondor have returned.'”

card.name: Gondor Bowmen
card.property: Tale. Plays to your support area. Archery: Exert a [Gondor] companion and discard this condition to make the fellowship archery total +2.
Arrows of the Last Alliance brought death to Sauron's forces.

card.name: Horn of Boromir
card.property: Bearer must be Boromir. Maneuver: Exert Boromir and spot an ally. Until the regroup phase, that ally is strength +3 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.
“On a baldric he wore a great horn tipped with silver….”

card.name: Might of Numenor
card.property: Tale. Maneuver: Spot a [Gondor] companion to reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Heal X companions, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
”'But the lords of Minas Tirith still fight on….'”

card.name: The Shards of Narsil
card.property: Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Stack a [Gondor] card from hand here. Fellowship: Add (1) to take a card stacked here into hand.
”'…Narsil was broken and its light extinguished, and it had not yet been forged again.'”

card.name: Some Who Resisted
card.property: Tale. Maneuver: Spot a [Gondor] companion to make the twilight cost of each maneuver event +2.
”'In the south the realm of Gondor long endured; and for a while its splendour grew….'”

card.name: Still Sharp
card.property: Skirmish: Spot The Shards of Narsil to make a [Gondor] companion strength +3 and damage +1.
”'The shards of Narsil… the blade that cut the Ring from Sauron's hand.'”

card.name: Voice of Rauros
card.property: Maneuver: Exert Aragorn to make each companion with the Aragorn signet damage +1 until the regroup phase.
“As he ran the cries came louder, but fainter now and desperately the horn was blowing.”

card.name: We Must Go Warily
card.property: Response: If the fellowship moves in the regroup phase, exert a [Gondor] companion twice to make each minion's twilight cost +1 until the next regroup phase.
”'This is the lawn of Parth Galen: a fair place in the summer days of old. Let us hope that no evil has yet come here.'”

card.name: Abandoning Reason for Madness
card.property: Shadow: Spot an [Isengard] minion to discard up to 3 cards from hand and draw an equal number of cards.
”'And why not, Gandalf?… Why not? The Ruling Ring? If we could command that, then the power would pass to us.'”

card.name: Can You Protect Me From Yourself
card.property: Maneuver: Spot an [Isengard] minion to exhaust Aragorn. The Free Peoples player may add 2 burdens to prevent this.
”'Where is the Ring?'”

card.name: Coming for the Ring
card.property: Regroup: Reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. Heal X [Isengard] minions, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
”'This evil cannot be concealed by the power of the Elves….'”

card.name: A Fell Voice on the Air
card.property: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert Saruman to play an [Isengard] weather condition from your discard pile. Its twilight cost is -2.
”'He's trying to bring down the mountain!'”

card.name: Hate and Anger
card.property: Shadow: Spot an Uruk-hai and a [Moria] minion to draw 3 cards.
The frenzy of Uruks is born of the fear of the very Goblins that work the pits.

card.name: Hollowing of Isengard
card.property: To play, spot an [Isengard] Orc. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Discard this condition to add (3).
”'Rip them all down!'”

card.name: Isengard Axe
card.property: Bearer must be an [Isengard] Orc. When you play this weapon, add (1).
Axes eat into the forests of Isengard as well as the victims of Saruman's Orcs.

card.name: Isengard Forger
card.property: Shadow: Exert this minion to add (1).
”'I looked on it and saw that, whereas it had once been green and fair, it was now filled with pits and forges.'”

card.name: Isengard Retainer
card.property: Regroup: Exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.
”'…the Eagles of the mountain went far and wide, and they saw many things: the gathering of wolves and the mustering of Orcs….'”

card.name: Isengard Servant
card.property: Regroup: Exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.
The servants of Isengard worked tirelessly to spread the influence of their master.

card.name: Isengard Shaman
card.property: Response: If an [Isengard] Orc is about to take a wound, remove (2) to prevent that wound.
”'Over all his works a dark smoke hung and wrapped itself about the sides of Orthanc.'”

card.name: Isengard Smith
card.property: Regroup: Exert this minion to discard a weapon (or all Free Peoples possessions if you can spot 5 companions).
”'No other folk make such a trampling….'”

card.name: Isengard Warrior
card.property: While you can spot another [Isengard] Orc, no player may use archery special abilities. Regroup:Exert this minion and spot 3 wounds on the Ring-bearer to exert every companion.
”'There is evil afoot in Isengard, and the West is no longer safe.'”

card.name: Isengard Worker
card.property: Regroup: Exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.
”'They were Elves once. Taken by the dark powers - tortured and mutilated….'”

card.name: One of You Must Do This
card.property: Maneuver: Exert an [Isengard] minion to make the Free Peoples player exert X companions, where X is the number of these races you can spot in the fellowship: Dwarf, Elf, Man, and Wizard.
”'And if we fail, what then? What happens when Sauron takes back what is his?'”

card.name: Orc Commander
card.property: Each other [Isengard] Orc is strength +1. Regroup: Exert Orc Commander to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.
”'It seems their delight to slash and beat down growing things that are not even in their way.'”

card.name: Orc Overseer
card.property: Regroup: Exert Orc Overseer twice to exhaust a companion (except the Ring-bearer).
”'What orders from Mordor, my Lord? What does the Eye command?'”

card.name: Orthanc Berserker
card.property: Damage +1. Maneuver: Spot 5 burdens and exert Orthanc Berserker twice to exhaust a companion (except the Ring-bearer).
The voice of Saruman compels his minions to stop at nothing to earn his favor.

card.name: The Palantir of Orthanc
card.property: To play, spot an [Isengard] minion. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Spot an [Isengard] minion and remove (1) to reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. Place that card on top of that player's draw deck.
”'Seven stars and seven stones….'”

card.name: Saruman
card.property: Saruman may not take wounds during the archery phase and may not be assigned to a skirmish. Uruk-hai are fierce. Response: If an Uruk-hai is about to take a wound, exert Saruman to prevent that wound.

card.name: Saruman
card.property: Saruman may not take wounds during the archery phase and may not be assigned to a skirmish. Assignment: Exert Saruman to assign an [Isengard] minion to a companion (except the Ring-bearer). That companion may exert to prevent this.

card.name: Servants to Saruman
card.property: Skirmish: Make an [Isengard] Orc strength +2 (or +3 if you have fewer than 3 cards in hand).
”'This is grievous news concerning Saruman… for we trusted him and he is deep in all our counsels.'”

card.name: Tower of Orthanc
card.property: To play, spot an [Isengard] minion. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, you may spot an exhausted companion to add (3).

card.name: Trapped and Alone
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each character skirmishing an [Isengard] Orc loses all damage bonuses from weapons.
”'…I had no chance of escape, and my days were bitter.'”

card.name: The Trees Are Strong
card.property: Regroup: Discard X [Isengard] Orcs to make the Free Peoples player wound X companions.
”'Their roots go deep.'”

card.name: Uruk Raider
card.property: Damage +1. While an ally is in the dead pile, this minion is strength +3 and fierce.
There is no safety where Saruman's emblem is shown.

card.name: Uruk Ravager
card.property: Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may spot Saruman to add (2).
”'…a ruined and terrible form of life.'”

card.name: Dangerous Gamble
card.property: Shadow: Spot a [Moria] minion to reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. Add (X), where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
“Almost they began to hope that they would escape.”

card.name: Depths of Moria
card.property: To play, spot a [Moria] Orc. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, add (2).
”…a great fissure had opened. Out of it a fierce red light came, and now and again flames licked at the brink…. Wisps of dark smoke wavered in the hot air.”

card.name: Hide and Seek
card.property: Search. Skirmish: Spot 2 [Shire] companions to make a [Moria] minion damage +1.
”'Which way shall we go?'”

card.name: Malice
card.property: Archery: Spot a [Moria] Orc and a [Sauron] Orc to wound an archer.
Fueled by Sauron's hatred of living things, Orcs searched for the Ring of Power.

card.name: Such a Little Thing
card.property: Maneuver: Spot a [Moria] minion to wound Boromir 3 times. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 Free Peoples possessions to prevent this.
”'Boromir… give the Ring to Frodo.'”

card.name: Gates of the Dead City
card.property: To play, spot a Nazgul. Plays to your support area. Each time a [Wraith] card adds a burden, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion.
”'…and they took Minas Ithil and abode in it, and they made it into a place of dread….'”

card.name: News of Mordor
card.property: Skirmish: Spot an [Isengard] minion to make a Nazgul damage +1.
”'Build me an army worthy of Mordor.'”

card.name: The Ring Draws Them
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, add (1) for each burden you can spot. At the end of each of your Shadow phases, exert a Nazgul or discard this condition.
”'If I move I shall be seen and hunted!'”

card.name: They Will Never Stop Hunting You
card.property: Maneuver: Spot a Nazgul to reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. Exert a companion bearing a ranged weapon X times, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
”'They're looking for Baggins, and if they mean well, then I'm a hobbit.'”

card.name: Too Great and Terrible
card.property: Maneuver: Spot a Nazgul to wound Gandalf twice. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 [Gandalf] cards from hand to prevent this.
“His eyes flashed and his face was lit as by a fire within. 'Do not tempt me! For I do not wish to become like the Dark Lord himself.'”

card.name: Ulaire Otsea
card.property: Twilight. Each time Ulaire Otsea wins a skirmish, you may exert him to transfer Blade Tip from your support area to the Ring-bearer.
”'…at all times they smell the blood of living things, desiring and hating it.'”

card.name: The Dark Lord Advances
card.property: Regroup: Exert a [Sauron] minion to reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. That player must discard X cards from hand, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
”'A power was there that we have not felt before.'”

card.name: Get Off the Road
card.property: Search. Shadow: Spot a [Sauron] minion and a Nazgul to make the Free Peoples player discard a card from the top of his or her deck for each burden you can spot.
”'The Morgul-lord and his Black Riders have come forth. War is preparing!'”

card.name: Gleaming in the Snow
card.property: Regroup: Exert a [Sauron] Orc and spot a [Gondor] companion to add a burden.
”'A Ring of Power looks after itself…. It may slip off treacherously, but its keeper never abandons it.'”

card.name: Hand of Sauron
card.property: Maneuver: Exert a [Sauron] minion to make the Free Peoples player discard a card at random from his or her hand.
”'The power of the Ring could not be undone.'”

card.name: His Cruelty and Malice
card.property: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a [Sauron] minion to make the Free Peoples player discard the top card from his or her draw deck.
”'Into this Ring he poured his cruelty, his malice, and his will to dominate all life.'”

card.name: Massing in the East
card.property: Regroup: Exert a [Sauron] minion to discard a card from the top of the Free Peoples player's draw deck for each of these races you can spot in the fellowship: Dwarf, Elf, Man, and Wizard.
”'The power of the Black Land grows….'”

card.name: Morgul Slayer
card.property: Regroup: Exert this minion to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).
”'Sauron was diminished, but not destroyed. His Ring was lost but not unmade.'”

card.name: Orc Butcher
card.property: For each [Sauron] condition you can spot, this minion is strength +1.
”'And yet we see that Sauron can torture and destroy the very hills.'”

card.name: Orc Guard
card.property: Maneuver: Exert this minion and discard your [Sauron] condition to discard a Free Peoples condition.
The malice of the Dark Tower thins the hopes of Men.

card.name: Orc Pillager
card.property: For each Free Peoples card borne by a character this minion is skirmishing, that character is strength -1.
Weapons of the West are often powerless against the threat of Sauron.

card.name: Orc Slayer
card.property: Regroup: Exert this minion to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).
“For it is a long tale, full of deeds great and terrible….”

card.name: Orc Swordsman
card.property: While this minion bears a weapon, he is strength +2.
”'Many evil things there are that your strong walls and bright swords do not stay.'”

card.name: Orc Trooper
card.property: For each card in your hand, this minion is strength +1.
The Dark Lord's power grows in unseen ways.

card.name: Orc Veteran
card.property: Skirmish: Discard your [Sauron] condition to make a character skirmishing this minion strength -1.
”'There was war, and the land was laid waste….'”

card.name: Orc Warrior
card.property: Maneuver: Exert this minion and discard your [Sauron] condition to make the Free Peoples player discard the top 2 cards from his or her draw deck.
“Orcs were multiplying again in the mountains.”

card.name: Our List of Allies Grows Thin
card.property: To play, exert a [Sauron] minion. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, add (1) for each ally you can spot.
”'The enemy is moving…. His eye is fixed on Rivendell. And Saruman, you tell me, has betrayed us.'”

card.name: Terrible as the Dawn
card.property: Maneuver: Spot a [Sauron] minion to wound Galadriel 3 times. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 Elves to prevent this.
”'In the place of the Dark Lord, you would have a Queen… All shall love me and despair!'”

card.name: Tower of Barad-dur
card.property: To play, exert a [Sauron] minion. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, the Free Peoples player must discard a card from hand.
“The Dark Tower had been rebuilt, it was said. From there the power was spreading….”

card.name: Why Shouldn
card.property: Maneuver: Spot a [Sauron] minion to discard Bilbo. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 Free Peoples conditions to prevent this.
”'No, wait, it's here in my pocket. Isn't that… isn't that odd now?'”

card.name: Bill the Pony
card.property: Bearer must be a Hobbit companion. The Shadow number of each site is -1. Discard Bill the Pony when at an underground site.
”'That animal can nearly talk…. He gave me a look as plain as Mr. Pippin could speak….'”

card.name: Frodo
card.property: Bearer must be Frodo. Fellowship: Discard a pipeweed possession and spot X pipes to heal a companion with the Frodo signet X times.
”'All the same, observations that I have made on my own many journeys south have convinced me that the weed itself is not native to our parts of the world.'”

card.name: Frying Pan
card.property: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Skirmish: Exert bearer to wound an Orc he or she is skirmishing.
”'I think I'm getting the hang of this!'”

card.name: Meant to Be Alone
card.property: Fellowship: Spot a Hobbit companion (except the Ring-bearer) to reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Remove (X), where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
”'You are a Ring-bearer, Frodo… to bear a Ring of Power is to be alone.'”

card.name: Melilot Brandybuck
card.property: Response: If a burden is about to be added by a Shadow card, exert Melilot Brandybuck to prevent that burden.
“Master Everard Took and Miss Melilot Brandybuck got on a table and with bells in their hands began to dance the Springle-ring: a pretty dance, but rather vigorous.”

card.name: Old Noakes
card.property: Each time a Shadow card makes you discard a card from hand, you may also discard a minion or Shadow condition.
”'There's been some strange folk crossing the Shire - Dwarves and others of a less than savoury nature.'”

card.name: Seek and Hide
card.property: Stealth. Skirmish: Spot 2 [Shire] companions to make a minion lose all damage bonuses.
A Hobbit's best friends in Moria are the very pillars that support its structure.

card.name: The Shire Countryside
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Shire] companions. Plays to your support area. Each time you remove a burden (except by a Hobbit's game text), you may heal a companion.
”'Life in the wide world goes on… scarcely even aware of the existence of hobbits….'”

card.name: Three Monstrous Trolls
card.property: Tale. Plays to your support area. Response: If a Shadow card is about to add any number of twilight tokens, exert a Hobbit ally to prevent this.
”'Great big nasty twenty foot high smelly things _- and they're arguing… arguing about how they were going to cook us!'”

card.name: Caras Galadhon
card.property: Forest. Sanctuary. While the fellowship is at Caras Galadhon, no more than one minion may be assigned to each skirmish.

card.name: Eregion Hills
card.property: When the fellowship moves to Eregion Hills, add a burden.

card.name: Gates of Argonath
card.property: River. Maneuver events may not be played.

card.name: The Great River
card.property: River. While the fellowship is at The Great River, cards may not be played from draw decks or discard piles.

card.name: House of Elrond
card.property: Sanctuary. When the fellowship moves to House of Elrond, the Free Peoples player may spot 2 Elves to remove a burden.

card.name: Wastes of Emyn Muil
card.property: Maneuver: Spot 4 companions and exert your [Isengard] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Archer. While Legolas is at a river or forest, add 1 to the fellowship archery total.
”'Praised be the bow of Galadriel, and the hand and eye of Legolas!… That was a mighty shot in the dark, my friend!'”

card.name: Boromir
card.property: Ranger. Fellowship: Add (2) to heal Boromir.
”…seated a little apart was a tall man with a fair and noble face… proud and stern of glance.”

card.name: Arwen
card.property: Ranger. Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, discard 3 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

card.name: Hand of Sauron
card.property: Maneuver: Exert a [Sauron] minion to make the Free Peoples player discard a card at random from his or her hand.
